settings.title: What does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro treat?
settings.text1:
Fine Lines and Wrinkles

The key to aging gracefully lies in taking care of your skin as early and as regularly as possible, both from the inside and out. Slathering on the greatest serums alone will only go so far.

Collagen is essential to skin health and beauty, and is the foundation of a youthful appearance. As we age, our collagen production tends to decrease and become less effective.

Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear naturally stimulates boosts collagen production levels deep within the skin and helps your skin rejuvenate from the inside out. Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear collagen-boosting effects are the foundation of its major wrinkle-fighting, skin-rejuvenating and anti-aging benefits. Giving you visibly healthier, younger-looking skin.
settings.text2:
In a Clinical Trial‚Ä¶

...70% of subjects reported lasting and clearly visible improvement in the reduction of wrinkles and fine lines. 91% of subjects reported improved skin tone and 82% reported enhanced smoothness of their facial skin.
settings.text3:
Breakouts and Acne

When you‚Äôre struggling with acne and breakouts, it‚Äôs easy to believe it‚Äôs because you‚Äôre doing something wrong. But you‚Äôre not: skin blemishes happen when hair follicles are blocked with dead skin, bacteria and oil. Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear goes deeper than any topical cream can go on it‚Äôs own to tackle acne at its root by eliminating breakout-causing bacteria, regulates sebum production, improves inflammation and prevents future flare ups. üëè üëã Later, acne.

settings.title: How do you use the Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear?
settings.text:
1. Cleanse face and ensure no residue is on the skin before wearing the Q-Rejuvalight Pro to ensure nothing is acting like a barrier for the wavelengths of light and to allow for maximum penetration

2. After your skin has dried, place the Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear on your face and program your customized treatment via the Qure Skincare App.

3. Once the 3 minute treatment is complete, remove the device and apply desired topical serum and/or moisturiser of your choice. Wipe down the Q-Rejuvalight Pro and store it inside the provided bag until next use.

settings.title: What colour wavelengths of lights does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro have?
settings.text:
The Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear has a total of 5 clinical-grade wavelengths of light:

  • Infrared light: Not visible to human eyes but it penetrates deepest into the skin for amplified results. Enhances product absorption.
  • Deep Red with Infrared light: Accelerates skin healing to fade and prevent scarring. Builds collagen to diminish wrinkles. Helps to repair sun damage and age spots.
  • Red: Anti-Ageing properties. Stimulates collagen and elastin production. Firms and plumps skin. Repairs skin cells and promotes hydration. Reduces inflammation, redness and rosacea.
  • Amber: Reduces appearance of dark spots. Soothes skin and calms swelling and inflammation.
  • Blue: Anti-bacterial, eliminates and prevents acne breakouts. Soothes and calms skin.

settings.title: What type of results will I see? How quickly will I see them?
settings.text:
Results are cumulative and optimal results are achieved with daily use. Depending on what skin concern is being treated, most users see results after the 2 weeks of daily use.

Typical results are reduction of acne breakouts and redness after 2 weeks. Smoother lines, improved skin tone and firmness, and reduction sun spots and discoloration after 10 weeks. With continued positive results of skin improving overtime.

settings.title: Where does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro treatment fit into a skincare routine?
settings.text:
The Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear can be used day or night. You can fit it into your current skincare routine after cleaning and/or exfoliating your skin.
After the 3 treatment is complete, follow with your topical skincare products of choice.

Read our blog on what skincare products go best with LED light therapy by clicking here.

settings.title: In a Clinical Trial...
settings.text: ...100% of subjects reported improved skin elasticity, skin hydration, texture, and wrinkles after 8 weeks.
settings.popup_content:
Clinical trial was conducted with female subjects with photo aging (accelerating aging) skin. 

Subjects were treated with the home-use LED therapy (637 and 854-nm) device on the left side of their face for 8 weeks. Primary outcomes measured in the study were the changes in the biophysical properties of the skin assessed with the following parameters: skin elasticity, skin hydration, texture, and wrinkles. 

J Cosmet Dermatol. 2020 Sep;19(9):2288-2294. doi: 10.1111/jocd.13613. Epub 2020 Jul 27.

  • Infrared light: Not visible to human eyes but it penetrates deepest into the skin for amplified results. Enhances product absorption.

settings.title: What type of results will I see? How quickly will I see them?
settings.text:
Every individual may respond differently to specific wavelengths of lights and results will depend on the goal you want to achieve. However, with daily use, you should be able to see improvements in 4 to 12 weeks. It is important to take "before and after" pictures to document your progress.

Results will be subtle and it is important to set your expectations right. This is not magic and results do not show overnight. Results are cumulative, frequent daily treatment is the key to seeing results at all.

Most users see a reduction of acne breakouts and redness after 2 weeks.

Smoother lines, improved skin tone and firmness after 10-12 weeks. With continued positive results of skin improving overtime. For the best results we recommend at least 12 weeks of daily use.

settings.title: At what age and when is the best time to start using LED light therapy?
settings.text:
Everyone can benefit from LED light therapy treatments. Anyone, at any age, with acne-prone skin can benefit from using the Q-Rejuvalight Pro ‚Äì to both treat acne and pro-actively prevent it.

When it comes to anti-ageing, we recommend prevention rather than correction, so anyone can start to incorporate red therapy light used by the Q-Rejuvalight Pro into your skincare regimen in their early twenties to help protect collagen for long-term healthy, youthful skin.

settings.cont_text: ...9 out of 10 subjects said they saw a reduction in acne after 2 weeks.
settings.pop_content:
Assessed the efficacy of the combination of blue 415 nm and near-infrared (IR) LED therapy for moderate acne.

Improvement ranging from 0% to 83.3%. A downward shift in the Burton grade was seen overall. Non-inflammatory lesion counts increased in four patients, but improved in the other seven by an average of 48.8%. No adverse effects were reported.

About the clinical trial
Clinical trial was conducted with male and female subjects with acne grades at baseline ranging from Burton grade 1 to 5. Subjects were treated with LED therapy, alternating between the blue (415 nm) and near-IR (830 nm) heads. No other treatment was allowed. Results were assessed and compared with the baseline values at 1, 4 and 8 weeks post-treatment.

Reference: J Cosmet Laser Ther. 2009 Jun;11(2):125-8. doi: 10.1080/14764170902777349.

settings.cont_text: ...8 out of 10 subjects reported a significant reduction in periorbital wrinkles
settings.pop_content:
87% experienced a reduction in the Fitzpatrick wrinkling severity score via a blinded clinical assessment. Improvements in skin appearance observed in LED-treated individuals suggested that LED at 660 nm is a safe and effective collagen-enhancement strategy. No adverse events or downtime were reported.

About the clinical trial
Clinical trial was conducted and investigated the potential of light-emitting diode (LED) treatments with a 660 nm. LED effects were then assessed in aged/photoaged individuals in a split-face single-blinded study.

Reference: SOURCE: J Invest Dermatol. 2009 Dec;129(12):2751-9. doi: 10.1038/jid.2009.186. Epub 2009 Jul 9

settings.cont_text: ...10 out of 10 subjects experienced improved skin complexion and collagen density
settings.pop_content:
Treated subjects experienced boosted collagen density and significant improvement in skin complexion and feeling

The treated subjects experienced significantly improved skin complexion and skin feeling, profilometrically assessed skin roughness, and ultrasonographically measured collagen density. The blinded clinical evaluation of photographs confirmed significant improvement in the intervention groups compared with the control.

About the clinical trial
A total of 136 volunteers participated in this prospective, randomized, and controlled study. Of these volunteers, 113 subjects were randomly assigned into treatment groups that treated twice a week with either 611-650 or 570-850 nm. The data collected at baseline and after 30 sessions included blinded evaluations of clinical photography, ultrasonographic collagen density measurements, computerized digital profilometry, and an assessment of patient satisfaction.
Reference: Photomedicine and Laser Surgery, 28 Nov 2013, 32(2):93-100 DOI: 10.1089/pho.2013.3616 PMID: 24286286 PMCID: PMC3926176

settings.popup_content_1:
Argireline has been found to be effective in reducing wrinkles, with efficacies up to 48% upon 4 weeks of twice daily treatment.
The total anti wrinkle efficiency in the Argireline group was 48.9%, the depth of the wrinkles was notably reduced.

About the clinical trial

Clinical trial was conducted and included 60 subjects that received a randomized treatment of argireline or placebo in a ratio of 3:1. Argireline or placebo was applied to their periorbital wrinkles twice daily for 4 weeks, and then evaluations were made for the improvements in wrinkles. Silicone replicas of the skin at the application area were made before and after the treatment, which were analyzed by a wrinkle-analysis apparatus.

Reference: Am J Clin Dermatol. 2013 Apr;14(2):147-53. The anti-wrinkle efficacy of argireline, a synthetic hexapeptide, in Chinese subjects: a randomized, placebo-controlled study. doi: 10.1007/s40257-013-0009-9.

settings.cont_text: ...9 out of 10 subjects said they saw a reduction in acne after 2 weeks.
settings.pop_content:
Assessed the efficacy of the combination of blue 415 nm and near-infrared (IR) LED therapy for moderate acne.

Improvement ranging from 0% to 83.3%. A downward shift in the Burton grade was seen overall. Non-inflammatory lesion counts increased in four patients, but improved in the other seven by an average of 48.8%. No adverse effects were reported.

About the clinical trial
Clinical trial was conducted with male and female subjects with acne grades at baseline ranging from Burton grade 1 to 5. Subjects were treated with LED therapy, alternating between the blue (415 nm) and near-IR (830 nm) heads. No other treatment was allowed. Results were assessed and compared with the baseline values at 1, 4 and 8 weeks post-treatment.

Reference: J Cosmet Laser Ther. 2009 Jun;11(2):125-8. doi: 10.1080/14764170902777349.

settings.cont_text: ...8 out of 10 subjects reported a significant reduction in periorbital wrinkles
settings.pop_content:
87% experienced a reduction in the Fitzpatrick wrinkling severity score via a blinded clinical assessment. Improvements in skin appearance observed in LED-treated individuals suggested that LED at 660 nm is a safe and effective collagen-enhancement strategy. No adverse events or downtime were reported.

About the clinical trial
Clinical trial was conducted and investigated the potential of light-emitting diode (LED) treatments with a 660 nm. LED effects were then assessed in aged/photoaged individuals in a split-face single-blinded study.

Reference: SOURCE: J Invest Dermatol. 2009 Dec;129(12):2751-9. doi: 10.1038/jid.2009.186. Epub 2009 Jul 9

settings.cont_text: ...10 out of 10 subjects experienced improved skin complexion and collagen density
settings.pop_content:
Treated subjects experienced boosted collagen density and significant improvement in skin complexion and feeling

The treated subjects experienced significantly improved skin complexion and skin feeling, profilometrically assessed skin roughness, and ultrasonographically measured collagen density. The blinded clinical evaluation of photographs confirmed significant improvement in the intervention groups compared with the control.

About the clinical trial
A total of 136 volunteers participated in this prospective, randomized, and controlled study. Of these volunteers, 113 subjects were randomly assigned into treatment groups that treated twice a week with either 611-650 or 570-850 nm. The data collected at baseline and after 30 sessions included blinded evaluations of clinical photography, ultrasonographic collagen density measurements, computerized digital profilometry, and an assessment of patient satisfaction.
Reference: Photomedicine and Laser Surgery, 28 Nov 2013, 32(2):93-100 DOI: 10.1089/pho.2013.3616 PMID: 24286286 PMCID: PMC3926176

  • Amber: Reduces appearance of dark spots. Soothes skin and calms swelling and inflammation.
  • Blue: Anti-bacterial, eliminates and prevents acne breakouts. Soothes and calms skin

settings.nutrient_title: Infuse A Clinically-Formulated Serum  To Treat Your Skin‚Äôs Needs
settings.popupsec_content1: Niacinamide is a skin-restoring ingredient that can visibly improve the appearance of enlarged pores, fine lines, and dull skin. It helps to decrease sebum production and boost skin clarity.
settings.popupsec_content2: Vitamin C is a potent antioxidant that helps defend skin from the visible impact of environmental stressors such as free radicals, plus it's a dullness-diminishing agent that can improve the visible signs of aging.
settings.popupsec_content3: Hyaluronic acid is naturally present in the human body. It has been shown to significantly increase skin moisture, reduce the appearance of wrinkles, and several studies show that it can make skin appear smoother, firmer and more youthful.
settings.popupsec_content4: Studies have shown that copper peptides can help your body make collagen and elastin. They also act as antioxidants, helping to repair damage to your skin.

settings.title: When will I see results, and how long will results last?
settings.text:
Micro-infusion treatment is powerful, and you‚Äôll likely notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you‚Äôll receive. This quick and easy home facial is perfect to do before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin‚Äôs complexion, fast.

Don‚Äôt forget to keep up with your everyday skincare routine to boost the effectiveness of your Microinfusion results and keep skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing long-term.

settings.title: How often can I do the treatment?
settings.text: We recommend a microinfusion treatment every 2-4 weeks.

settings.title: When is the best time to do micro infusion?
settings.text: We recommend doing the treatment at nigh before bedt. Avoid being in the sun and using makeup for 24 hours after the treatment.

settings.title: What are the benefits of Microinfusion?
settings.text:
The needles of the microinfusion device and the stamping action triggers the body‚Äôs natural healing process and in turn boosts the production of collage, making your skin look firmer and fine lines look softer.

The serum booster that you choose to infuse during your microinfusion will determine the major benefits of your treatment. Very fine hollow needles infuse micro-droplets of concentrated serum at a specific depth into the dermis (top layer) of your skin precisely where they are needed to accelerate absorption of active ingredients that target specific skin concerns.

You can switch up your treatments and even mix the two boosters together!

A few more benefits:

  • More even skin tone and texture
  • Smaller pores
  • Glowing complexion
  • Softer fine lines
  • Firmer, rejuvenated skin

settings.title: What are the benefits of Microinfusion?

settings.title: What are the side effects?
settings.text: You may experience a bit of skin redness for the first few hours after treatment. However, this should be minimal and disappear quickly.

settings.title: What does Microinfusion feel like?
settings.text:
It feels like a tiny prick. Most people say it‚Äôs completely painless.

The ultra-fine needles in our Microinfusion devices mean that you‚Äôll feel little to no pain during treatment. While you may feel a bit of discomfort or a prick here and there, the pain is extremely minimal and will be practically gone an hour or two after your session!

settings.title: What‚Äôs the difference between home micro-needling rolling and microinfusion?
settings.text:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn‚Äôt deliver any ingredients directly into your skin.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

settings.title: How many treatments do I get out of one Micro Infusion device?
settings.text: You can get 5-6 treatments from 1 microinfusion device. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.

settings.title: Can I use any serum with my microinfusion device?
settings.text: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for micro-infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure‚Äôs micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.title: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post treatment?
settings.text:
Avoid makeup for roughly one day while steering clear of harsh exfoliating devices/products and chemicals to the treated areas.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply‚Äîbut you may not even need it.

settings.title: How do I use/ perform the micro infusion facial?
settings.text:
1. Twist open the chamber of the device and fill until it‚Äôs half full with one (1) ampule of serum and close it tight. Put back on the lid.

Option: You can mix two of the serums to to treat multiple concerns!

2. Leave it upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, you can wash your face and make sure your hands are nice and clean.

3. Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start stamping!

Start at the center of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap. This means each time you stamp you overlap the previous stamp halfway.

If you would like more collagen-building on a specific area such as a stubborn divot or acne scar, you can go over it 2-3 times to target that concern. If you have any active blemishes, you can get as close as possible, but avoid stamping directly on any active breakouts on the skin.

4. Repeat 2-3 passes for better results.

Leave the serum on overnight so your skin can drink up all that yummy serum. (Hack: take any leftover serum from the bottle and pat it onto your face and neck).

settings.title: How do I clean the device?
settings.text:
1. Wash the chamber out with water and your favorite gentle cleanser.

2. Twist off the microneedling head and leave in alcohol 70% for 1-2 minutes

3. Store in a clean, dry place until next use.

settings.top_text: 87% smoother facial wrinkles and fine lines
settings.middle_text_full:
In a Clinical Trial...

...8 out of 10 subjects reported a significant reduction in periorbital wrinkles

Read More About Clinical Study

87% experienced a reduction in the Fitzpatrick wrinkling severity score via a blinded clinical assessment. Improvements in skin appearance observed in LED-treated individuals suggested that LED at 660 nm is a safe and effective collagen-enhancement strategy. No adverse events or downtime were reported.

About the clinical trial

Clinical trial was conducted and investigated the potential of light-emitting diode (LED) treatments with a 660 nm. LED effects were then assessed in aged/photoaged individuals in a split-face single-blinded study.

Reference: SOURCE: J Invest Dermatol. 2009 Dec;129(12):2751-9. doi: 10.1038/jid.2009.186. Epub 2009 Jul 9
settings.middle_text:
Reduces depth of wrinkles and smooths fine lines.

Stimulates natural collagen for firmer, fuller skin.

Calms redness and promotes a healthy, glowing complexion.

settings.top_text: 91% improved skin tone and enhanced smoothness
settings.middle_text_full:
In a Clinical Trial...

...10 out of 10 subjects experienced improved skin complexion and collagen density

Read More About Clinical Study

Treatment of the periorbital region was reported more effective than the nasolabial region. At 12-week follow-up, 91% of subjects reported improved skin tone, and 82% reported enhanced smoothness of skin in the treatment area.

About the clinical trial

Clinical trial was conducted to assess reduction in sun damage signs following 12 weeks of LED therapy with combined wavelengths of 633 and 830 nm. Sun-damage reduction was assessed at 6, 9, and 12 weeks by clinical photography and patient satisfaction scores.

Reference: SOURCE: J Invest Dermatol. 2009 Dec;129(12):2751-9. doi: 10.1038/jid.2009.186. Epub 2009 Jul 9
settings.middle_text:
Soothing, anti-inflammatory benefits reduces redness and inflammation.

Fades pigmentation and dark spots for more radiant, even-toned skin.

Heals and rejuvenates skin, helping with sundamage, hyperpigmentation.

settings.top_text: 83% reduction of acne breakouts
settings.middle_text_full:
In a Clinical Trial...

...9 out of 10 subjects said they saw a reduction in skin acne after 2 weeks.

Read More About Clinical Study

Improvement ranging up to 83.3% of moderate acne lesion count. A downward shift in the Burton grade was seen overall. No adverse effects were reported.

About the clinical trial

Clinical trial was conducted with male and female subjects with acne grades at baseline ranging from Burton grade 1 to 5. Subjects were treated with LED therapy, alternating between the blue (415 nm) and near-IR (830 nm) heads. No other treatment was allowed. Results were assessed and compared with the baseline values at 1, 4 and 8 weeks post-treatment.

Reference: SOURCE: J Invest Dermatol. 2009 Dec;129(12):2751-9. doi: 10.1038/jid.2009.186. Epub 2009 Jul 9
settings.middle_text:
Reduces acne and prevents future breakouts by eliminating bacteria.

Heals and fades post breakout marks for more even tone skin.

Rapidly reduces inflammation and regulates oil production.

settings.question: What colour wavelengths of lights does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro have?
settings.answer:
The Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear has a total of 5 clinical-grade wavelengths of light for the best results:

  • Infrared light (880 nm): Not visible to human eyes but it penetrates deepest into the skin for amplified results. Increases circulation, protects existing collagen and enhances product absorption.
  • Deep Red (660 nm): Accelerates skin healing to fade and prevent scarring. Builds collagen to diminish wrinkles. Helps to repair sun damage and age spots.
  • Red (630 nm): Anti-Ageing properties. Stimulates collagen and elastin production, firms and plumps skin, repairs skin cells and promotes hydration to help reduce inflammation, redness and rosacea.
  • Amber (605 nm): Reduces appearance of dark spots. Soothes skin and calms swelling and inflammation.
  • Blue (415 nm): Anti-bacterial, eliminates and prevents acne breakouts. Soothes and calms skin.

settings.question: What type of results will I see? How quickly will I see them?
settings.answer:
Every individual may respond differently to specific wavelengths of lights and results will depend on the goal you want to achieve. However, with daily use, you should be able to see improvements in 4 to 12 weeks. It is important to take "before and after" pictures to document your progress.

Results will be subtle and it is important to set your expectations right. This is not magic and results do not show overnight. Results are cumulative, frequent daily treatment is the key to seeing results at all.

Most users see a reduction of acne breakouts and redness after 2 weeks.

Smoother lines, improved skin tone and firmness after 10-12 weeks. With continued positive results of skin improving overtime. For the best results we recommend at least 12 weeks of daily use.

settings.question: At what age and when is the best time to start using LED light therapy?
settings.answer:
Everyone can benefit from LED light therapy treatments. Anyone, at any age, with acne-prone skin can benefit from using the Q-Rejuvalight Pro ‚Äì to both treat acne and pro-actively prevent it.

When it comes to anti-ageing, we recommend prevention rather than correction, so anyone can start to incorporate red therapy light used by the Q-Rejuvalight Pro into your skincare regimen in their early twenties to help protect collagen for long-term healthy, youthful skin.

settings.question: How do you use the Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear?
settings.answer:
1. Cleanse face and ensure no residue is on the skin before wearing the Q-Rejuvalight Pro to ensure nothing is acting like a barrier for the wavelengths of light and to allow for maximum penetration

2. After your skin has dried, place the Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear on your face and program your customized treatment via the Qure Skincare App.

3. Once the 3 minute treatment is complete, remove the device and apply desired topical serum and/or moisturiser of your choice. Wipe down the Q-Rejuvalight Pro and store it inside the provided bag until next use.

settings.question: Where does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro treatment fit into a skincare routine?
settings.answer:
It can be used day or night. You can fit it into your current skincare routine after cleaning and/or exfoliating your skin.
After the 3 treatment is complete, follow with your topical skincare products of choice.

settings.title: Introducing the Qure Micro-Infusion System

settings.headings: Dual Action For Twice The Results
settings.text:
Qure‚Äôs Micro-Infusion System has a one-two punch, making it uniquely effective.

First, it allows you to ‚Äústamp‚Äù your skin with hollow 24K gold clinical-grade needles. This creates a controlled trauma in your skin, signaling your body to increase collagen production, which naturally boosts elasticity and smoothes fine lines & wrinkles. The needles are tinier than human hair, so you won‚Äôt even feel them.

Second, the invisible micro-channels ‚Äústamp‚Äù the top layer of your skin with clinically-formulated serums, of your choice.

This allows powerful ingredients to penetrate and be infused into your skin, accelerating absorption by up to 300%.

Perfect for anyone wanting a fresh, dewy glow to their skin, especially before an event or occasion.

settings.content: Using micro-needling devices like derma rollers often comes with a risk of irritation and infection caused by their blunt or multi-use needles. The Qure Micro-Infusion System features single-use sterile needles that are disposed of after each use, eliminating the risk of infection.

Thanks to the use of the ‚Äústamping‚Äù method instead of the ‚Äúrolling‚Äù method standard in micro-needling, the Qure Micro-Infusion System creates CLEAN ‚Äúmicro-channels‚Äù without damaging your skin.
This improves serum absorption and makes the treatment more effective than with the irregular channels created by derma rollers.

settings.heading: What You Should Know for the Best Results
settings.text_con: The Qure Micro-Infusion System is designed with your safety in mind
settings.content:
Unlike popular at-home derma rollers, our stamper device features single-use sterile heads that eliminate the risk of infection or unnecessary skin damage caused by blunt and multi-use needles.

While it‚Äôs safe & easy to use, here are a few rules you should follow while using your Qure Micro-Infusion System:

settings.title: When will I see results?
settings.text:
Micro-infusion treatment is an effective skin booster treatment, and you‚Äôll likely notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you‚Äôll receive. This quick and easy home facial is perfect to perform a day or two before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin‚Äôs complexion, fast.

Don‚Äôt forget to keep up with your everyday skincare routine to boost the effectiveness of your Microinfusion results and keep skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing long-term.

settings.title: How often can I do the treatment?
settings.text: We recommend a microinfusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!

settings.title: When is the best time to do micro infusion?
settings.text: We recommend doing the treatment at night before bed. Avoid being in the sun and using makeup for 24 hours after the treatment. For more information

settings.title: What are the benefits of Microinfusion?
settings.text:
The needles of the microinfusion device and the stamping action triggers the body‚Äôs natural healing process and in turn boosts the production of collage, making your skin look firmer and fine lines look softer.

The serum booster that you choose to infuse during your microinfusion will determine the major benefits of your treatment. Very fine hollow needles infuse micro-droplets of concentrated serum at a specific depth into the dermis (top layer) of your skin precisely where they are needed to accelerate absorption of active ingredients that target specific skin concerns.

You can switch up your treatments and even mix the two serums together!

A few more benefits:

  • More even skin tone and texture
  • Glowing, fresh complexion
  • Softer fine lines
  • Firmer, rejuvenated skin

settings.title: Are there any side effects?
settings.text:
Everyone‚Äôs skin is different. You may experience a bit of skin redness for the first few hours after treatment. However, this should be minimal and disappear quickly.

We recommend consulting with your dermatologist or doctor before use if you suffer from any skin condition. A patch test on an area of your skin that isn't too exposed prior to treatment is also recommended, to have a better understanding of how your skin will react and the downtime you should expect.

settings.title: What does Microinfusion treatment feel like? Does it hurt?
settings.text:
It feels like a tiny prick. Most people say it‚Äôs completely painless.

The ultra-fine needles (0.5mm length) in our Microinfusion devices mean that you‚Äôll feel minimal pain during treatment. While you may feel a bit of discomfort or a prick here and there when first starting the treatment, you will get used to the feeling quite quickly.

settings.title: What‚Äôs the difference between home micro-needling rolling and microinfusion?
settings.text:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn‚Äôt deliver any ingredients directly into your skin.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

settings.title: How many treatments do I get out of one Micro Infusion device?
settings.text: Each needle head is to be used one time per treatment, and disposed of after each treatment. This minimizes the risk of infection and unnecessary damage to the skin. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.

settings.title: Can I use any serum with my microinfusion device?
settings.text: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for micro-infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure‚Äôs micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.title: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post treatment?
settings.text:
After you‚Äôve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized, which will reduce shedding and alleviate tightness.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Qure Microinfusion will absorb more easily, so it‚Äôs important to keep the skin clean and use products that don‚Äôt have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven‚Äôt been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying skincare products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‚Äòactive‚Äô skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition.
  • Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply‚Äîbut you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin‚Äôs reaction.

settings.title: What‚Äôs the difference between home micro-needling derma roller and microinfusion?
settings.text:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn‚Äôt deliver any ingredients directly into your skin. The reuse of needles can cause unnecessary damage to the skin and has a higher risk of infection as using alcohol does disinfect the tool, but it is difficult to sterilize it completely and the needles also become blunt when reused, which severely compromises technique.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

Qure‚Äôs microinfusion system has single-use needle heads which are disposed of after each to ensure that any risk of infection is minimal - unlike at-home microneedling rollers multiple times.

settings.title: What needle length is the microinfusion device?
settings.text: Qure‚Äôs microinfusion system needle heads are 0.5mm length for ‚Äúepidermal-needling‚Äù which is designed to enhance skin-care ingredient absorption and skin texture .

settings.title: How do I use/ perform the micro infusion facial?
settings.text:
1. Twist open the chamber of the device and fill until it‚Äôs half full with one (1) ampule of serum and close it tight. Put back on the lid.
Option: You can mix two of the serums to treat multiple concerns!

2. Leave it upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, you can wash your face and make sure your hands are nice and clean.

3. Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start stamping!

Start at the center of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap. This means each time you stamp you overlap the previous stamp halfway.

4. Repeat 2-3 passes for better results.

Leave the serum on overnight so your skin can drink up all that yummy serum. (Hack: take any leftover serum from the bottle and pat it onto your face and neck).

settings.title: How do I clean the device?
settings.text:
Once you‚Äôve finished stamping your way to brighter and plumper skin, follow the below cleaning instructions:

  1. Twist off the needle head with the cap attached and safely dispose.
  2. Wash the chamber out with water and gentle cleanser.
  3. Let the device air dry completely, on a clean surface, before packing away.
  4. Open a brand new needle head packet and attach the needle head onto the device. Ensure hands are clean and don‚Äôt open the cap of the needle head.

Instant, intense hydration. Effectively plumps up fine lines, reduces redness, boosts and protects the skin barrier for healthy, supple skin.

Skin Concerns: Dehydration, dryness, redness, fine lines, dull skin.

  • Antioxidant properties soothes skin, reduces redness and irritation
  • Decreases appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, creating plumped and well hydrated skin.

...Beta-glucan is found to be 20% more hydrating than hyaluronic acid; penetrating deeper into the skin.

...Increases collagen up to 32%, reducing the depth of wrinkles and diminishing fine lines.

Citations...

settings.heading: What You Should Know for the Best Results
settings.text_con: The Qure Micro-Infusion System is designed with your safety in mind.
settings.content:
Unlike popular at-home derma rollers, our stamper device features single-use sterile heads that eliminate the risk of infection or unnecessary skin damage caused by blunt and multi-use needles.

While it‚Äôs safe & easy to use, here are a few rules you should follow while using your Qure Micro-Infusion System:
settings.title: DO + SAFETY GUIDELINES
When will I see results?
settings.content:
Micro-infusion treatment is an effective skin booster treatment, and you‚Äôll likely notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you‚Äôll receive. This quick and easy home facial is perfect to perform a day or two before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin‚Äôs complexion, fast.

Don‚Äôt forget to keep up with your everyday skincare routine to boost the effectiveness of your Microinfusion results and keep skin healthy, hydrated, and glowing long-term.

settings.title: How often can I do the treatment?
settings.content: We recommend a microinfusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!

settings.title: When is the best time to do micro infusion?
settings.content: We recommend doing the treatment at night before bed. Avoid being in the sun and using makeup for 24 hours after the treatment. For more information

settings.title: What are the benefits of Microinfusion?
settings.content:
The needles of the microinfusion device and the stamping action triggers the body‚Äôs natural healing process and in turn boosts the production of collage, making your skin look firmer and fine lines look softer.

The serum booster that you choose to infuse during your microinfusion will determine the major benefits of your treatment. Very fine hollow needles infuse micro-droplets of concentrated serum at a specific depth into the dermis (top layer) of your skin precisely where they are needed to accelerate absorption of active ingredients that target specific skin concerns.

You can switch up your treatments and even mix the two serums together!

A few more benefits:

  • More even skin tone and texture
  • Glowing, fresh complexion
  • Softer fine lines
  • Firmer, rejuvenated skin

settings.title: Are there any side effects?
settings.content:
Everyone‚Äôs skin is different. You may experience a bit of skin redness for the first few hours after treatment. However, this should be minimal and disappear quickly.

We recommend consulting with your dermatologist or doctor before use if you suffer from any skin condition. A patch test on an area of your skin that isn't too exposed prior to treatment is also recommended, to have a better understanding of how your skin will react and the downtime you should expect.

settings.title: What does Microinfusion treatment feel like? Does it hurt?
settings.content:
It feels like a tiny prick. Most people say it‚Äôs completely painless.

The ultra-fine needles (0.5mm length) in our Microinfusion devices mean that you‚Äôll feel minimal pain during treatment. While you may feel a bit of discomfort or a prick here and there when first starting the treatment, you will get used to the feeling quite quickly.

settings.title: What‚Äôs the difference between home micro-needling rolling and microinfusion?
settings.content:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn‚Äôt deliver any ingredients directly into your skin.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

settings.title: How many treatments do I get out of one Micro Infusion device?
settings.content: Each needle head is to be used one time per treatment, and disposed of after each treatment. This minimizes the risk of infection and unnecessary damage to the skin. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.

settings.title: Can I use any serum with my microinfusion device?
settings.content: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for micro-infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure‚Äôs micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.title: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post treatment?
settings.content:
After you‚Äôve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized, which will reduce shedding and alleviate tightness.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Qure Microinfusion will absorb more easily, so it‚Äôs important to keep the skin clean and use products that don‚Äôt have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven‚Äôt been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying skincare products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‚Äòactive‚Äô skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition.
  • Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply‚Äîbut you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin‚Äôs reaction.

settings.title: What‚Äôs the difference between home micro-needling derma roller and microinfusion?
settings.content:
Micro-needling focuses on stimulating your body's own collagen by creating micro-injuries. But it doesn‚Äôt deliver any ingredients directly into your skin. The reuse of needles can cause unnecessary damage to the skin and has a higher risk of infection as using alcohol does disinfect the tool, but it is difficult to sterilize it completely and the needles also become blunt when reused, which severely compromises technique.

With microinfusion, you not only reap the benefits of micro-needling, but also deliver active ingredient solutions to target your specific skin concerns - This makes it work quicker and more effectively.

Qure‚Äôs microinfusion system has single-use needle heads which are disposed of after each to ensure that any risk of infection is minimal - unlike at-home microneedling rollers multiple times.

settings.title: What needle length is the microinfusion device?
settings.content: Qure‚Äôs microinfusion system needle heads are 0.5mm length for ‚Äúepidermal-needling‚Äù which is designed to enhance skin-care ingredient absorption and skin texture .

settings.title: How do I use/ perform the micro infusion facial?
settings.content:
1. Twist open the chamber of the device and fill until it‚Äôs half full with one (1) ampule of serum and close it tight. Put back on the lid.
Option: You can mix two of the serums to treat multiple concerns!

2. Leave it upside down for 1-2 minutes. During this time, you can wash your face and make sure your hands are nice and clean.

3. Once the serum has had enough time to make its way into the needles, you can take off the lid and start stamping!

Start at the center of the face and work your way outward to cover the full face. Stamp with a 50% overlap. This means each time you stamp you overlap the previous stamp halfway.

4. Repeat 2-3 passes for better results.

Leave the serum on overnight so your skin can drink up all that yummy serum. (Hack: take any leftover serum from the bottle and pat it onto your face and neck).

settings.title: How do I clean the device?
settings.content:
Once you‚Äôve finished stamping your way to brighter and plumper skin, follow the below cleaning instructions:

  1. Twist off the needle head with the cap attached and safely dispose.
  2. Wash the chamber out with water and gentle cleanser.
  3. Let the device air dry completely, on a clean surface, before packing away.
  4. Open a brand new needle head packet and attach the needle head onto the device. Ensure hands are clean and don‚Äôt open the cap of the needle head.

settings.title: How does the 90-day money back guarantee work?
settings.content: You have 90 days to try Qure‚Äôs Micro Infusion System and see the results for yourself. If you don‚Äôt see any difference in your skin‚Äî if you do not experience firmer, brighter, younger-looking skin, simply contact us and we will gladly refund your money. This guarantee applies to the 3 month supply bundle. You‚Äôll just need to provide before and after photos after each 2 week treatment to qualify.

settings.question: What colour wavelengths of lights does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro have?
settings.answer:
The Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear has a total of 5 clinical-grade wavelengths of light for the best results:

  • Infrared light (880 nm): Penetrates deepest into the skin for amplified results. Increases circulation, protects existing collagen and enhances product absorption.
  • Deep Red (660 nm): Accelerates skin healing to fade and prevent scarring. Builds collagen to diminish wrinkles. Helps to repair sun damage and age spots.
  • Red (630 nm): Anti-Ageing properties. Stimulates collagen and elastin production, firms and plumps skin, repairs skin cells and promotes hydration to help reduce inflammation, redness and rosacea.
  • Amber (605 nm): Reduces appearance of dark spots. Soothes skin and calms swelling and inflammation.
  • Blue (415 nm): Anti-bacterial, eliminates and prevents acne breakouts. Soothes and calms skin.

Anti-Aging Treatment: Combines red, deep red, infrared and amber wavelengths Anti-breakout Treatment: Combines red and blue wavelenghts

settings.question: What type of results will I see? How quickly will I see them?
settings.answer:
Every individual may respond differently to specific wavelengths of lights and results will depend on the goal you want to achieve. However, with daily use, you should be able to see improvements in 4 to 12 weeks. It is important to take "before and after" pictures to document your progress.

Results will be subtle and it is important to set your expectations right. This is not magic and results do not show overnight. Results are cumulative, frequent daily treatment is the key to seeing results at all.

Most users see a reduction of acne breakouts and redness after 2 weeks.

Smoother lines, improved skin tone and firmness after 10-12 weeks. With continued positive results of skin improving overtime. For the best results we recommend at least 12 weeks of daily use.

settings.question: How do you charge the Q-Rejuvalight Pro?
settings.answer: Every Q-Rejuvalight Pro comes with a universal USB-C charging cable. Simply plug the cable into any regular USB charger to charge your mask!There won't be any difference between countries, and voltage won't be changed so you can get the maximum power wherever you are.Charging takes about 2-4 hours and gives you approximately 8 to 10 full treatment sessions.

settings.question: Does the Q-Rejuvalight Pro come with warranty?
settings.answer: Q-Rejuvalight Pro Facewear comes with one (1) year warranty covering any manufacturer related problems resulting from everyday use of the product. However, this device is designed to last a lifetime! Proudly designed in Australia.

settings.question: When will I see results with Micro-Infusion?
settings.answer:
Micro-infusion treatment is an effective skin booster treatment, and you‚Äôll likely notice a radiance boost, softer fine lines and overall a healthy fresh complexion in the next day or two.

The more treatments you perform the greater skin benefits over time you‚Äôll receive. This quick and easy home facial is perfect to perform a day or two before a big event, when you need to look to boost your skin‚Äôs complexion, fast.

settings.question: How often can I perform Micro-Infusion?
settings.answer: We recommend a microinfusion treatment every 2 weeks for the best results!

settings.question: What does Micro-Infusion treatment feel like? Does it hurt?
settings.answer:
It feels like a tiny prick. Most people say it‚Äôs completely painless.

The ultra-fine needles (0.5mm length) in our Micro-Infusion means you‚Äôll feel minimal pain during treatment. While you may feel a bit of discomfort or a prick here and there when first starting the treatment, you will get used to the feeling quite quickly.

settings.question: How many treatments do I get out of one Micro-Infusion device?
settings.answer: Each needle head is to be used one time per treatment, and disposed of after each treatment. This minimizes the risk of infection and unnecessary damage to the skin so you can get the best results. Use 1 full serum ampoule per treatment.

settings.question: Can I use any serum with my Micro-Infusion device?
settings.answer: Please keep in mind that not all serums are suitable for micro-infusion. Some may cause irritation and should be avoided! We have developed our potent serum ampoules that are perfect for Qure‚Äôs micro infusion system. They are formulated to have low risk of irritation and with no fragrance.

settings.question: Is there any aftercare that I should follow post my Micro-Infusion treatment?
settings.answer:
After you‚Äôve infused your skin with all that skin boosting serum, try to keep the skin clean for 24 hours and follow these post treatment guidelines:

  • The day after treatment, wash your face with a gentle cleanser and apply a nourishing moisturizer.
  • Users may experience minor redness and irritation after the procedure but should quickly subside. Skin may experience mild swelling, peeling or flaking. You can minimize these effects by keeping the skin moisturized.
  • Skip makeup for as long as you can, but at minimum, at least 24 hours.
  • No exercising or strenuous activity for the first 24 hours post-treatment. Sweating and gym environments are harmful, rife with bacteria, and may cause adverse reactions.
  • Keep in mind, anything you put on your skin after using Micro-Infusion will absorb more easily, so it‚Äôs important to keep the skin clean and use products that don‚Äôt have harsh ingredients (no acids!).
  • Avoid touching your face, especially with dirty hands that haven‚Äôt been sanitized.
  • Avoid swimming, saunas and steam rooms for at least 24-48 hours post-treatment.
  • Avoid applying products containing fragrances, active ingredients or acids such as Alpha Hydroxy Acids, Beta Hydroxy Acid, Retinol (Vitamin A), Vitamin C or anything perceived as ‚Äòactive‚Äô skincare including scrubs or toners for at least 2-3 days post-treatment, as it may cause irritation.
  • Avoid exfoliating products for 2-3 days after treatment because they can be abrasive on skin when it is in that kind of condition.
  • Avoid direct sun exposure immediately after treatment. Apply a high protection sunscreen when going outdoors, and avoid prolonged sun exposure. Use good quality non-comedogenic sunscreen if going in the sun.

By the next day, you should be free to resume your normal activities, skincare routine, and any makeup you want to apply‚Äîbut you may not even need it. Just ensure you monitor your skin‚Äôs reaction.

settings.title: Micro-Infusion Refill Kit
settings.text: Refill kit includes new sterile needle heads to attach to your Micro-Infusion device and serum your choice to infuse with.

settings.title:
Minimized Risk of
Infection and Irritation
settings.text: With single use needle heads there is no need for disinfecting so risk of infection and irritation is minimized with disposable needle heads that are replaced every treatment.

settings.title:
Better Results,
No Downtime
settings.text: Other needle heads that are reused become blunt and cause unnecessary damage to the skin, therefore prolonging recovery. New (sharp, straight) needle heads provide clean micro-injuries every treatment and allows for a more effective treatment, with a minimal downtime due to no unnecessary skin damage.

Enhanced serum penetration with 24K gold needles delivering serum DIRECTLY into skin for maximum absorption and results, to give it the vibrant and luminous boost it needs.
